thread.title: Who Did Lady Gaga's Silvery Makeup For Super Bowl 2017? She Went With A Familiar Name
thread.title_full: Who Did Lady Gaga's Silvery Makeup For Super Bowl 2017? She Went With A Familiar Name

author: Amy Sciarretto
title: Who Did Lady Gaga's Silvery Makeup For Super Bowl 2017? She Went With A Familiar Name
text:
Follow Us ÂŽ 2016 Bustle Who Did Lady Gaga's Silvery Makeup For Super Bowl 2017? She Went With A Familiar Name Source: Kevin C. Cox/Getty Images Sport/Getty Images By Amy Sciarretto 2 hours ago 
For her 2017 Super Bowl Halftime performance, Lady Gaga brought it . But did anyone really think she wouldn't ? Mother Monster rocked the stage during her 13-minute performance. Her entire look was dramatically Gaga and she opted for sparkly silver makeup that looked like a masquerade ball mask over her eyes. It matched her long-sleeved, silver, and statement shouldered bodysuit and boots. She also painted her pout with bright and classic red lipstick. So, who did Lady Gaga's makeup for Super Bowl 51 and what products were used? 
Gaga's makeup artist for The Big Game was Sarah Tanno , who also did the singer's makeup last year when she performed the National Anthem. Tanno recently posted a photo of Gaga from Super Bowl 50 , during which she rocked a sequined, custom, and red Gucci suit, with matching sparkling eyeshadow. Tanno's caption asked fans what type of makeup they should do for the Halftime Show. 
Tanno clearly had been thinking about Ma Monster's look for weeks and she opted to do high drama eyes and lips. When Gaga sat to perform "A Million Reasons" at the piano, she revealed lashes for days. 
Gaga also wore Marc Jacobs Beauty products, as well. The brand confirmed beforehand in an Instagram post that Gaga's look would be created by Tanno using their repertoire of cosmetics. Source: Jamie Squire/Getty Images Sport/Getty Images 
Sparkles for days. Source: Jamie Squire/Getty Images Sport/Getty Images 
It was like a mask! Source: Tom Pennington/Getty Images Sport/Getty Images 
Her eye makeup functioned like an accessory. Source: Tom Pennington/Getty Images Sport/Getty Images 
After her costume change, Gaga's eyemakeup was still sparkly, like her boy shorts. But her lashes were so major. Source: Al Bello/Getty Images Sport/Getty Images 
Those ruby red lips were somethin' else. Source: Tom Pennington/Getty Images Sport/Getty Images 
Let's just stop right here. Gaga slayed the Super Bowl. Her look was dramatic in all the right ways. Source: marcbeauty on Instagram 
Here was the pre-game confirmation. Since Marc Jacobs Beauty is sold at Sephora, you can replicate or create a variation of Gaga's Super Bowl 51 look for more IRL circumstances! 
While Gaga's makeup is so often dramatic, as it was during her performance at The Big Game, I love that her Super Bowl press conference look was so... soft and wearable.
